message:
‎"Corporations don’t reap the same privacy protections as do people, the Supreme Court ruled unanimously Tuesday... The Obama administration urged the high court to reject AT&T’s claim of personhood... They contended that, if the lower court’s decision stood, corporations could escape public oversight."

http://www.wired.com/threatlevel/2011/03/supreme-court-foia/?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+wired27b+%28Blog+-+27B+Stroke+6+%28Threat+Level%29%29
